flood.title: Flood Guidance
flood.guidance: Stay calm. Move to higher ground. Avoid standing water and electrical lines. Follow local authority instructions. Nearest shelter: Community Hall (1.2 km).

fire.title: Fire Guidance
fire.guidance: Evacuate immediately if safe. Use stairs, not elevators. Call emergency services. Nearest shelter: Fire Station (0.8 km).

earthquake.title: Earthquake Guidance
earthquake.guidance: Drop, cover, and hold on. Stay away from windows and heavy objects. After shaking stops, move to open ground.

medical.title: Medical Guidance
medical.guidance: Call emergency services. Provide first aid if trained. Keep the patient comfortable and monitor breathing.

default.title: General Guidance
default.guidance: Follow official instructions and stay tuned to updates from authorities.
